entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy or freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to freezing rain or rain this afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
